page.title: 08Claverdon's Name
page.content:
Spellings of the name Claverdon
The name of Claverdon has been spelt in many different ways since the last Domesday project. At that time it was spelt Clavendone but now at this Domesday project it is spelt Claverdon. The spellings can be obtained from gravestones,letters etc.
1086 Clavendone - Domesday 1195 Claverdone - Letter 1260 Claredon - Patent 1485 Claverdon - Warrant 1539 Clardon - Legal Records 1660 Clarlm - Tombstone 1710 Clareydon - Tombstone 1800+Claverdon - Current project
